alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:06PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 506 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Black Hawk, New Underwood, Caputa, and Rapid City Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 54 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
